content: last stitch r ow 2 sl 1 purwise wyif purl across repeat these two row 9 more times for a total of 10 sets large/exlarge row 1 *sl 1 purlwise wyib k1* repeat * to * across r ow 2 sl 1 purwise wyif purl across repeat these two row 11 more times for a total of 12 sets heel turn small/medium row 1 rs sl 1 k11 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws sl 1 p4 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 sl 1 k to one stitch before gap ssk across gap k1 turn work r ow 4 sl 1 p to one stitch before gap p2tog across gap p1 turn work repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches have been worked ending with a ws row large/exlarge row 1 rs sl 1 k13 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws sl 1 p5 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 sl 1 k to one stitch before gap ssk across gap k1 turn work r ow 4 sl 1 p to one stitch before gap p2tog across gap p1 turn work repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches have been worked ending with a ws row the last two row will end with ssk and p2tog across the gap only page �2 of �4 gusset small/medium work across the 13 heel stitches in this manner k1 p1 k2 p1 3 times k 2 this is setting the rib pattern to continue on the bottom of the sock using same needle with heel stitches pick up 11 stitches stitches on right side of heel flap needle 1 work across instep held stitches in k2 p1 rib pattern needle 2 using third needle pick up 11 stitches on left side of heel flap needle 3 w ork 7 stitches from needle 1 onto needle 3 keeping in rib pattern round 1- needle 1 p1 k2 twice p1 k to last three stitches k2tog p1 needle 2 work across instep stitches in rib pattern needle 3 k1 ssk *k6 p1 k2 three times round 2- work all stitches as they are remember to keep the purl stitch as t he last stitch on needle 1 continue working these two rounds until you have a total of 21 stitches on needles 1 and 3 large/exlarge work across the 14 heel stitches in this manner k1 p1 k2 p1 4 times this is setting the rib pattern to continue on the bottom of the sock using same needle with heel stitches pick up 13 stitches stitches on right side of heel flap needle 1 work across instep held stitches in k2 p1 rib pattern needle 2 using third needle pick up and knit 13 stitches on left side of heel flap as you did on right side needle 3 work 7 stitches from needle 1 onto needle 3 keeping in rib pattern as set after heel turn there should be 20 s titches on needles 1 & 3 each round
